attributes.action: write off overpayments of tax credits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to write off tax credit overpayments for 2005/6 for all that have been overpaid ( excluding fraudulent claims)why should previous years overpayments be written off, and not the 05/06 years surely this is discrminination against one group of people and another, the system should be worked on the previous years earnings like all other tax,
